abstract: Apple removed Thuat Nguyen’s applications after users complained that their accounts had been used to buy his applications without permission.
snippet: Apple removed Thuat Nguyen’s applications after users complained that their accounts had been used to buy his applications without permission.
lead_paragraph: Apple said that it had banished a developer and his applications from the company’s online store after he breached the accounts of users and engaged in fraudulent purchases.

headline.print_headline: Apple Blocks App Developer, Citing Violations

abstract: Google wants you to skip the YouTube app on the iPhone, which is controlled by Apple, and go straight to its new YouTube mobile site on the Web.
snippet: Google wants you to skip the YouTube app on the iPhone, which is controlled by Apple, and go straight to its new YouTube mobile site on the Web.
lead_paragraph: What’s the difference between the new version of YouTube’s mobile Web site and the Apple-created YouTube application that is installed on every iPhone? The Web site is a lot better. At least that’s the subtext of a video that YouTube released as it announced the overhaul of the mobile site on Wednesday.

headline.main: Google Makes the iPhone YouTube App Obsolete
